meta.description: Maximize the water flow from the source station to the distribution hub in Aquaville's water distribution network.

sets.name: STATIONS
sets.description: Stations in the water distribution network

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of pipelines between stations in thousands of gallons per hour

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of water between stations in thousands of gallons per hour

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from source to sink in thousands of gallons per hour

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total flow from the source to the sink

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source station

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink station
